title: Uttaman Introduction (Villuppattu) Lyrics Uttama Villain Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Uttaman Introduction (Villuppattu)
Singer(s): Subbu Arumugam, Kamal Haasan
Lyrics: Subbu Arumugam
Music: M Ghibran

Thandhanaththom endru solliye
villinil paada (aamaa)
villinil paada
vandharulvaai kalaimagalae.

Thaanathandhathtodu
iru sandhangalum thaazhathodu
sandhangalum thaazhaththodu
vaana vambai uruviththa kai
mun thoomiyodu (aama)
mun thoomiyodu
aththanayum melaththodu

Thenpaandi seemaikootu
chera naattu thaiyyam serthu
chera naattu thaiyyam serthu
arjunaru vaasu pradhaas thaan
paandi nagarai (aamaa)
paandi nagarai
amarkkalamaa aala porom.

Mela vaanam keela boomi
maththiyilum uthama villain (+Narendhiran Sathyamoorthy )
maththiyilum uthama villain
arithaaram poosum saami
ulagathukku (aamaa)
ulagathukku
ubagaari bhramma nyaani.

Arasiyal vaadhi avan
unmayai sonnar pol
adhisayam naanum kandaen.

nayanarga sidhasoodal
abai avargal modhidave
sagala kalai thaerchi pettren.

Aaadhi sivan paadhi umai
adhisayitha thavamo.
arjunarin per sonnaal
achcham urumulano.

thangal arulal pongum mangalam
engum thandhidave. (provided by +PRAKSHITH S )
siva siva siva sivakamikku
thillai natagaraaja.

Sambalam indri nadanamaadum
ambala nataraaja.
thandhanam kondu thaiyyam aadum
arjuna maharaaja.

orukaal thooki aaduvadheno
irukaal aattam mayakkam thaano.

siru siru kinjai
karaththil uduththi.
arugil mangai
arulum mannai.
